items.sentence: It looked like you didn\'t want to do what you were doing.
It might be more difficult to do than you think it\'ll be.
I heard a man\'s voice and thought it sounded like Tom\'s.
Tom hoped Mary wouldn\'t find out about what had happened.
I think that I have a right to know what\'s going on here.
I think there\'s still a chance Tom will get here on time.
I hate to bother you, but would you mind closing the door?
I know that it is highly unlikely that anyone can help me.
I laughed when Tom told me he was planning to get married.
It\'s about time someone did something about that problem.
